newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Caspian starts Ara with buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Caspian starts Ara with buy.

text.p: --Caspian Reserach said it had intiated coverage on Mexican construction firm Consorcio Ara with a buy recommendation.

--Caspian analysts Sebastien Chatel and Paul Rodriguez situated a 12-month target price of 38 pesos for the stock, equivalent to an upside of 58 percent in nominal pesos and 42 percent in U.S. dollars.
--said shares attractively valued due to large land reserves, expected strong volume growth in 1997 and 1998, and its diversified revenue base.
--Ara fell 20 centavos to 25.20 pesos in mid-morning trade.
